title: WTB Danny Murphy 1914 Piedmont Art Stamp
author: Sailingmachine

posts.post_title: WTB Danny Murphy 1914 Piedmont Art Stamp
posts.post_content: Looking to purchase 1914 Danny Murphy T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamp. I've been looking for a few years to no avail. Hopefully someone has one available. Interested in raw or graded. Any condition at this point. Ty
